:offset.description: The number of intervals on the left side of the grid, and there can be no grids in the interval
:offset.description_zh: 栅格左侧的间隔格数，间隔内不可以有栅格

:pull.description: The grid moves the number of tiles to the left

:push.description: The grid moves the number of tiles to the right

:span.description: The number of raster placeholders, which is equivalent to display: none when it is 0
:span.description_zh: 栅格占位格数，为 0 时相当于 display: none

:xs.description: The screen < 576px responsive raster, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:xs.description_zh: 屏幕 < 576px 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象

:sm.description: The screen ≥ 576px responsive raster, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:sm.description_zh: 屏幕 ≥ 576px 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象

:md.description: The screen ≥ a 768px responsive grid, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:md.description_zh: 屏幕 ≥ 768px 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象

:lg.description: The screen ≥ a 992px responsive grid, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:lg.description_zh: 屏幕 ≥ 992px 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象

:xl.description: The screen ≥ a 1200px responsive grid, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:xl.description_zh: 屏幕 ≥ 1200px 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象

:xxl.description: The screen ≥ a 1600px responsive grid, which can be a number of rasters or an object with additional attributes
:xxl.description_zh: 屏幕 ≥ 1600px 响应式栅格，可为栅格数或一个包含其他属性的对象
